result:
I have found the following information about budget travel tiers and price ranges:

*   **The Cost of Travel in India: A Detailed Budget Breakdown** ([https://www.neverendingfootsteps.com/cost-of-travel-...](https://www.neverendingfootsteps.com/cost-of-travel-...)) - A street food walking tour in New Delhi with UrbanAdventures costs 4500₹/$65.
*   **32 Budget International Trips From India 2025** ([https://traveltriangle.com/Blog/Worldwide](https://traveltriangle.com/Blog/Worldwide)) - Budget international trips from India in 2025 start from 25k, including destinations like Thailand & Singapore.
*   **Cost of Travelling in India | Budget, Mid-Range or Luxury Trip** ([https://indiasomeday.com/Article](https://indiasomeday.com/Article)) - A budget traveler in India can expect to spend INR 3,000-4,000 (35-50 USD / 30-45 EUR) per day per person.
*   **25 Amazingly Cheap Places to Travel in 2025 (Costs + Why)** ([https://www.indietraveller.co/top-cheap-places-to-travel](https://www.indietraveller.co/top-cheap-places-to-travel)) - Cambodia is a cheap travel destination with a backpacker budget of $25 a day and a mid-range budget of $45 a day.
*   **30 Places To Travel On A Budget** ([https://weareglobaltravellers.com/2020/05/places-to-...](https://weareglobaltravellers.com/2020/05/places-to-...)) - A daily budget of Rs 4700/day (≈£21/€23/$25 USD) is estimated for exploring a small island off the coast of India.
*   **How Much a Europe Trip Cost from India - Travel Guide** ([https://www.reliancegeneral.co.in/insurance/blogs/h-...](https://www.reliancegeneral.co.in/insurance/blogs/h-...)) - A sample budget breakdown for a Europe trip from India includes flights (₹80,000 - ₹160,000), accommodation (₹56,000 - ₹140,000), food (₹84,000 - ₹140,000), and getting around (₹60,000 - ₹120,000).
*   **50 Budget International Trips from India | Grab Upto 40% Off** ([https://www.thrillophilia.com/Thailand](https://www.thrillophilia.com/Thailand)) - Taiwan is a budget travel destination, with estimated costs of $35-$70 per day. Vietnam is also mentioned.
*   **How much should I save up to travel around India for a ...** ([https://www.reddit.com/r/TravelHacks](https://www.reddit.com/r/TravelHacks)) - A budget of $100 dollars a day per person is suggested for a decent hotel, food, and travel in India, with Delhi and Mumbai being more expensive.
*   **What is the average cost of traveling around India per ...** ([https://www.quora.com/](https://www.quora.com/)) - Daily costs in India include: Budget Hotel - ₹1000 to ₹1500 ( $15- $20 ), Food - ₹500 - ₹700 ( $8 - $10 ), Transport - ₹.
*   **How Much Does It Cost to Travel World in 2025?** ([https://alittleadrift.com/travel-budget-one-year](https://alittleadrift.com/travel-budget-one-year)) - A mid-range travel budget of $32,000 is suggested, allowing for upgraded accommodation, food, and activities compared to a lower budget.

The website "Home and Roam Adventures" lists 15 types of travelers: Adventure, Backpacking, Luxury, Cultural/Heritage, Nature/Wildlife, Solo, Group, Slow, Food and Culinary, Wellness and Retreat, Volunteer or Service, Road Trips, Digital Nomad, Historical, and Cruise. URL: https://homeandroamadventures.com/types-of-travelers/. Title: 15 Types of Travelers: Find Your Perfect Style Now!

Common travel interests and activities include cultural immersion (language learning, cooking classes, etc.), nature adventures (wildlife safaris, mountain climbing, etc.), adventure sports (skydiving, paragliding, etc.), food & drink exploration (food tasting tours, wine tasting, etc.), creative pursuits (travel blogging, sketching, etc.), water adventures (snorkeling, sailing, etc.), urban explorations (urban photography, scenic drives, etc.), and learning on the go (historical site visits, language practice, etc.). Source: 81 Travel Hobbies to Fuel Your Wanderlust and Adventure Spirit, URL: https://sometimes-homemade.com/travel-hobbies/

I have found a list of the busiest airports in the world for 2024. The list includes the airport name, location, country, IATA/ICAO code, and total passengers.  For example, the busiest airport in the world in 2024 was Hartsfield–Jackson Atlanta International Airport with 108,067,766 passengers. The data was extracted from Wikipedia: List of busiest airports by passenger traffic (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_busiest_airports_by_passenger_traffic).
